name: GunZ 2: The Second Duel
description: GunZ 2: the Second Duel is a free-to-play 3D TPS and is the most fast-paced tough action shooter game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.4 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7 Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card, GeForce GTX 260 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space

reviews.review_text: This game will be a disapointment to GunZ 1 players who are expecting it to be like the original. Maiet should have put GunZ 1 on Steam, instead of this game, or just upgraded the graphics on GunZ 1. The game currently suffers from low player participation with less than 400 players online at any time. The game lacks a deathmatch mode, though it does have a team deathmatch mode.
To k style or not.... oh they removed it? Well back to the drawing board for me.   Developers Choices
There's no button to shoot yourself

If you played the first game, I don't recommend playing this one, 'cause it's gonna be a disappointment.  The first game had such a high skill ceiling. It was an amazing game that rewarded coordination and aiming. The community used to be really strong and would often find new tricks and make the game even harder to master.  K-style was an unintended thing that made GunZ great and they simply decided to turn their backs on it and on the community that made their game popular.
Garb. Don't even think about playing, waste of time. Play the Original Gunz instead (Gunz 1). Much better.
'Unable to find a match' 'Unable to find a match' 'Unable to find a match' 'Unable to find a match'   *uninstalled*
the first one was better. go play a private server. git gud kids.
Very bad. Unless you feel like laughing at terrible jiggle-physics don't get this game.
